document_data.mainbody:
alchatha Maereegh was a high priest of Moander, the Rotting God, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
In addition to being the high priest of the Hidden Glades temple in the Chondalwood, Maereegh was also the Mouth of Moanderâ€”a title given to the highest ranking servant of Moander and the leader of the gods cult. She attained this title upon the death of the previous holder, Mogion, in the .
Dalchatha controlled a vast network of spies and special task forces. She kept Moander fed with an endless supply of victims. In exchange, Moander blessed her with perpetual youth.
